definitions.definition: To go and use the potty: to leave in order to urinate or defecate.
To go crazy: to become insane.
(diminutive) A chamber pot, particularly (children) the pot used when toilet-training children.
(diminutive) Any other device or place for urination or defecation: a toilet; a lavatory; a latrine; an outhouse.

definitions.example: The noise that the neighbour's kids were making was driving Fred potty.

definitions.definition: Easy to pot the ball on.
